actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction from gross income to individuals who do not itemize deductions.

summary.text: Charitable Deduction Fairness Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a direct charitable tax deduction for an individual not itemizing deductions equal to the amount that would be allowed for charitable cash contributions if such individual itemized.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction from gross income to individuals who do not itemize deductions.
